author: Anonymous Calc
title: gride of drracket
question:
hi i remember in one of the edx videos the instructor mentioned how drracket had a different plane in terms of the x and y values/ I just wanted to confirm if my understanding of this is correct.
essentially there can be no negative x or y values. but you CAN have negative dx and dy values correct? I've attached an image below.
student_answer: You have to reverse the y axis. So positive y is going down, x is the same.
